known_issues: Deployed app showing 'not found' error after Version 27 production release

existing_features.title: Fix the 'Not Found' error displayed when navigating to the deployed application. Ensure the TanStack Router configuration correctly handles the root route and all defined routes (home, about, event-details, registration, gallery, check-registration, admin, admin/dashboard) so that users land on the home page by default without seeing a 404/not-found screen.

Ensure the frontend build configuration (index.html and asset paths) supports client-side routing correctly in the Internet Computer deployment environment, so that deep-link navigation and page refreshes do not result in 'Not Found' errors.

projectName: Fix 'Not Found' routing error on deployed app
